creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; face, PR shoulder, and hands of a woman wearing a camoflaged jacket and hat, holding a tube of toothpaste and a toothbrush; greenish-yellow burned-out car with its hood up at center in front of pink concrete block wall; bearded man in blue shirt and green jacket and glasses at right with a woman wearing a white dress with blue spots and a purple belt; received in blue frame
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 The Laws of Interior Design
title: The Laws of Interior Design
